item.title: Redmi Turbo 4 to Get MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC; Realme Neo 7 SE With Dimensity 8400 Teased - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Redmi Turbo 4, Realme Neo 7 SE to Get MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Series SoCs

Publication Date: December 19, 2024 Source: Gadgets 360

The Redmi Turbo 4 will be the first smartphone featuring the MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra chipset, launching in early 2025. Meanwhile, the Realme Neo 7 SE is also expected to use this processor, with its debut being teased by the company.

  • The Redmi Turbo 4 is confirmed to launch in China by early 2025.
  • It will be powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra chipset.
  • The Realme Neo 7 SE will likely feature the same processor.
  • Dimensity 8400 features advanced generative AI capabilities and supports up to 320-megapixel camera sensors.
  • Smartphones with this SoC can achieve WQHD displays with 144Hz refresh rates.
"The latest MediaTek chipset claims to help capture more light and focus faster."

This collaboration between Redmi and Realme signifies a competitive advancement in smartphone technology, leveraging MediaTek's powerful new chipset for enhanced performance.

item.title: Vivo Y29 5G launched in India with Military Grade durability: All you need to know - India TV News
item.description:
Vivo Y29 5G launched in India with Military Grade durability: All you need to know

Publication Date: December 26, 2024 | Source: India TV News

Vivo has unveiled the Vivo Y29 5G in India, a mid-range smartphone priced from Rs 13,999. It features military-grade durability with an IP64 rating for dust and splash resistance.

  • 6.68-inch LCD with 120Hz refresh rate and up to 1000 nits brightness.
  • 50MP AI Night Mode rear camera and 8MP front camera.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor and a 5500mAh battery.
  • Running on Funtouch OS 14 based on Android 14.
  • Available in four storage variants with prices starting at Rs 13,999.
“Vivo claims the battery retains 80% capacity over four years of usage.”

The Vivo Y29 5G offers robust features at an affordable price, making it a competitive option in the mid-range smartphone market.

item.title: iPad 11 to Reportedly Be Launched Early Next Year, Could Arrive With iPadOS 18.3 - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Apple Could Launch the iPad 11 Early Next Year: Report

Date: December 23, 2024 | Source: Gadgets360

Apple is planning to launch the iPad 11 early next year, aligning the release with the iPadOS 18.3 update. This report suggests a launch in late January 2025, contrasting earlier claims of a March release.

  • The iPad 11 is expected to be the entry-level model.
  • It may feature Apple's in-house modem for Wi-Fi and 5G connectivity.
  • Rumors suggest it could include the A17 Pro chipset.
  • The launch timing could coincide with the availability of the iPadOS 18.3 update.
  • An earlier Bloomberg report had speculated a March 2025 launch.
“Apple has been working on an iPad model with an A14 chipset, but it was a prototype for testing the new modem.”

In conclusion, the iPad 11's early launch signals Apple's aggressive strategy in tablet innovation as they continue to enhance connectivity and performance features.

item.title: Xiaomi Pad 7's India launch date revealed by Amazon - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
item.description:
Xiaomi Pad 7's India Launch Date Revealed

Publication Date: January 10, 2024 | Source: Amazon.in

Xiaomi has announced that it will introduce the Pad 7 to the Indian market on January 10, following its launch in China in October.

  • The Pad 7 was revealed through a promotional page on Amazon.in.
  • Amazon's promo does not disclose the specifications for the Indian version but suggests the availability of the Bluetooth keyboard and stylus.
  • Geekbench listings indicate that the Indian model may feature a Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 processor, 12GB RAM, and Android 15.
  • Assumed specifications include an 11.2” 144Hz LCD display, 13MP primary camera, 8MP front camera, and an 8,850 mAh battery.
  • Xiaomi has also launched the Pad 7 Pro in China, but it may not arrive in India.
"The Indian Xiaomi Pad 7 was spotted on Geekbench earlier this month with the Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 SoC, Android 15, and 12GB RAM."

This upcoming launch highlights Xiaomi's continued expansion in the Indian market with competitive specifications at an accessible price point.

item.title: Apple iPhone 18 Pro to get huge camera upgrade, with variable aperture and more - India TV News
item.description:
Apple iPhone 18 Pro to Get Huge Camera Upgrade, with Variable Aperture and More

Publication Date: December 25, 2024 | Source: India TV News

The upcoming iPhone 18 Pro is generating excitement due to anticipated revolutionary upgrades in camera technology and processing power.

  • The iPhone 18 Pro may feature a variable aperture camera for enhanced image quality.
  • Advanced manufacturing technology for the camera lens supplied by BE Semiconductor.
  • Expected to run on Apple's new M5 chip series.
  • The M5 chips will likely include variants for better performance and efficiency.
  • Rumors about the iPhone 17 series also suggest significant upgrades in terms of facial recognition and camera capabilities.
The iPhone 18 Pro could redefine mobile photography and solidify its position as a leader in smartphone technology.

These innovations could set new standards in the smartphone industry and reaffirm Apple’s commitment to pushing technological boundaries.

item.title: South Korean Researchers Unveil Wearable ‘Iron Man’ Exoskeleton Robot to Help People with Paraplegia ... - Gadgets 360
item.description:
This Iron Man-Inspired Robot Helps People with Paraplegia Walk Again

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Gadgets360

South Korean researchers have developed the WalkON Suit F1, a wearable robotic exoskeleton designed to help individuals with paraplegia walk again, offering more independence and mobility.

  • The suit allows users to walk and approach it while sitting in a wheelchair.
  • It supports individuals with complete paralysis (ASIA A-grade) but is not for rehabilitation purposes.
  • Developed in collaboration with Angel Robotics, it features a frontal-docking system for easier use.
  • Users can maintain balance and walk at a speed of 3.2 km/h, freeing their hands during mobility.
  • The suit weighs 50 kg and is designed to navigate various environments, including stairs and narrow passages.
“The WalkON Suit F1 project solves several issues of its predecessors, providing users more independence,” said Professor Kyoungchul Kong, CEO of Angel Robotics.

This innovative exoskeleton represents a significant advancement in assistive technology, providing new opportunities for individuals with mobility challenges.

item.title: Instagram Reportedly Testing Feature to Allow Users to View Story Highlights From a Week Ago - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Instagram May Allow Users to View Story Highlights From a Week Ago

Date: December 23, 2024
Source: Gadgets 360

New feature in testing by Instagram allows users to view Story Highlights from the past week, enhancing user engagement.

  • Instagram is testing a feature to view Story Highlights from mutual followers after 24 hours.
  • The feature will apply only to stories saved as Highlights by users.
  • This is designed to help users catch up on missed updates amidst current content.
  • Currently, only a small group of users are testing this feature.
“Users will not be able to see standard older stories that disappear after 24 hours.”

This new feature is expected to be rolled out globally soon, enhancing the way users interact with their content.

item.title: Apple confirms iOS 18.2.1 build number, iOS 18.3 beta update in progress - Business Standard
item.description:
Apple Confirms Upcoming iOS Updates: 18.2.1 Build Number Revealed and iOS 18.3 Beta Testing Underway

Publication Date: N/A Source: Mac Rumours

Apple has announced that the iOS 18.2.1 update is in development, with a confirmed build number of 22C161. This minor update aims to resolve bug issues and improve security, though specific details remain scarce.

  • The iOS 18.2.1 update will address minor bugs and potential security weaknesses.
  • There is no urgent need for this update as no critical bugs have been reported.
  • The swift announcement indicates Apple's commitment to stability and security ahead of the upcoming iOS 18.3.
  • iOS 18.3 is currently being tested and expected to launch in early 2025.
“Historically, when an anonymous account releases the build number for an upcoming iOS update, it is typically followed by a public release within a week.”

In conclusion, while iOS 18.2.1 is on the horizon, users may face delays due to the holiday season.

item.title: Samsung unveils new durable Sonic the Hedgehog-themed microSD cards - Business Standard
item.description:
Samsung unveils new durable Sonic the Hedgehog-themed microSD cards

Publication Date: Not specified Source: GSM Arena

Samsung has collaborated with SEGA to introduce a new series of highly durable microSD cards designed around the beloved Sonic the Hedgehog franchise.

The Sonic the Hedgehog PRO Plus microSD series impresses with both speed and resilience, tailored for gamers and technology enthusiasts alike.

  • Available in four variants representing iconic characters:
  • 128GB - Knuckles the Echidna (Red icon)
  • 256GB - Tails (Yellow icon)
  • 512GB - Sonic the Hedgehog (Blue icon)
  • 1TB - Shadow the Hedgehog (Black icon)
  • Prices range from USD 23.99 for 128GB to USD 125.99 for 1TB.
  • All variants are A2-rated with read speeds up to 180 MB/s and write speeds of 130 MB/s.
  • Durable against environmental factors including submersion in saltwater, high temperatures, and dropping from 4.8 meters.
“These cards are built to withstand harsh environments, ensuring reliable storage in challenging conditions.”

These new microSD cards cater to users in need of dependable storage solutions, whether for outdoor experiences or demanding work environments.

item.title: Apple in Early Stage of Developing New Doorbell Camera to Foray Smart Home Market - IndianWeb2.com
item.description:
Apple Developing New Doorbell Camera with Face ID for Smart Home Market

Publication Date: December 23, 2024
Source: Industry Reports

Apple is reportedly working on a smart doorbell camera equipped with Face ID technology, aimed at entering the smart home market, with a potential launch by late 2025.

  • The doorbell would utilize Face ID technology for facial recognition and unlocking.
  • It will include Apple's Secure Enclave chip for storing biometric data securely.
  • Proxima chip will ensure Face ID images are processed locally.
  • Expected compatibility with third-party HomeKit smart locks.
  • Data will be backed up to iCloud for enhanced security.
“This doorbell camera is part of Apple's broader strategy to expand its smart home offerings,” industry analysts report.

Further expansions into smart home devices by Apple are anticipated, including a new operating system named homeOS.

item.title: Apple in Early Stages of Developing New Doorbell Camera to Foray Smart Home Market - IndianWeb2.com
item.description:
Apple Develops New Doorbell Camera with Face ID for Smart Home Market

Publication Date: December 23, 2024 | Source: MacDaily News

Apple is reportedly developing a new smart doorbell camera featuring Face ID technology, expected to launch in late 2025.

  • The device aims to compete with established products from Amazon and Google.
  • Features include Face ID for unlocking doors and integration with third-party HomeKit smart locks.
  • The camera will store biometric data securely using Apple's Secure Enclave chip.
  • It will support iCloud integration for data backup, boosting Apple’s subscription services.
  • A smart home hub with a touchscreen is also rumored for development.
“This doorbell camera is part of Apple's strategy to expand its smart home offerings.”

In conclusion, Apple's move into the smart doorbell market highlights its commitment to enhancing its smart home ecosystem.

item.title: Amazon Offering Big Discounts on Smart TVs From Leading Brands in Year End Sale: See Prices, Deals - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Amazon Offering Big Discounts on Smart TVs From Leading Brands: See Deals

Publication Date: December 2023
Source: Gadgets360

Amazon is running a year-end sale in India with significant discounts on smart TVs from brands like Samsung, Sony, and LG, offering customers additional bank benefits and coupon discounts.

  • Up to 65% discounts available on smart TVs until December 31.
  • Additional discounts for purchases with SBI and HDFC Bank cards.
  • Highlighted deals include:
    • 65-inch LG QNED 4K TV for Rs. 79,990 after discounts.
    • 32-inch Hisense LED TV for Rs. 11,499 after discounts.
“Customers can avail of additional benefits like bank or exchange offers and coupon discounts to lower the effective selling price.”

This year-end sale presents an excellent opportunity for customers looking to upgrade their home entertainment systems with major price cuts on popular brands.

item.title: Alternative investment funds: Dispelling myths and unlocking potential | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Alternative Investment Funds: Dispelling Myths and Unlocking Potential

Publication Date: September 2023 Source: Mint

Alternative Investment Funds (AIFs) in India have crossed ₹5 trillion in funds raised, with investment commitments nearing ₹12 trillion. However, AIFs only represent about 5% of India's GDP, highlighting significant growth potential compared to the US (50%) and UK (10%).

  • AIFs have seen substantial growth in India.
  • They accounted for ₹5 trillion in raised funds as of September.
  • Total investment commitments are nearly ₹12 trillion.
  • Only 5% of India’s GDP is represented by AIFs.
  • This is a stark contrast to 50% in the US and 10% in the UK.
  • Indicates a promising future for AIFs in India.
“AIFs represent just about 5% of India's GDP, underlining immense growth potential.”

The growth of AIFs demonstrates both rising interest and the potential for significant growth in India’s investment landscape.

item.title: From party planning to productivity, these apps will make your life easier | Mint - Mint
item.description:
From party planning to productivity, these apps will make your life easier

Publication Date: December 25, 2024 | Source: Mint

This article explores various innovative apps that enhance productivity and manage daily tasks, featuring standout options like Karo, which streamlines collaboration through WhatsApp.

  • Karo is designed for task management and can remind others through WhatsApp.
  • Developed by Mustafa Yusuf, Karo includes an AI assistant for creating task lists.
  • The app plans to expand with an Android version soon.
“You don’t need to have the Karo app to look at the task or mark it done.”

In a world where productivity apps are abundant, Karo stands out by integrating social reminders directly into familiar platforms like WhatsApp, making it easier to manage collaborative tasks.

item.title: WhatsApp Rolls Out New Feature To Scan Documents Directly Via Camera For iOS Users; Heres How to Use It - Zee News
item.description:
WhatsApp Rolls Out New Feature To Scan Documents Directly Via Camera For iOS Users; Here’s How to Use It

Date: October 2023 Source: Zee News

This new feature allows iOS users to scan documents directly through the WhatsApp camera, eliminating the need for third-party scanning apps.

  • WhatsApp has rolled out its latest iOS update version 24.25.89 that includes this feature.
  • Users can capture documents easily using their device's camera.
  • The feature is in line with WhatsApp's efforts to simplify document sharing.
  • This update also includes the introduction of a new party popper emoji.
  • To use the feature, users must follow simple steps to scan and send documents.
“With this feature, WhatsApp users can quickly capture a document using their device’s camera.”

The introduction of this document scanning feature marks a significant enhancement in WhatsApp's functionality, providing convenience and streamlining workflows for users.

item.title: Scientists create Iron Man-like robot to help paraplegics walk | Daily Sabah - Daily Sabah
item.description:
Scientists create Iron Man-like robot to help paraplegics walk

Publication Date: Not available | Source: Not available

This innovative robotics project aims to enhance the mobility of individuals with spinal cord injuries, enabling them to walk again with the assistance of a robotic exoskeleton.

  • The exoskeleton mimics the movements of a human body.
  • It is designed to be user-friendly, allowing easy adjustments for different user heights.
  • The project showcases significant advances in robotic technology.
  • Potential applications could expand beyond rehabilitation to assist with mobility in various situations.
  • Researchers emphasize the importance of integrating user feedback in future developments.
“This is more than just technology; it is a new opportunity for those who have lost their ability to walk.”

In conclusion, this breakthrough represents a significant step forward in assistive technologies, offering hope and greater independence to paraplegics.

item.title: At Rs 37,999, there is no better compact Android flagship than the Samsung Galaxy S23 - The Indian Express
item.description:
The Samsung Galaxy S23: A Compact Android Flagship at an Unbeatable Price

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

The Samsung Galaxy S23, now priced at Rs 37,999, remains a top choice in the compact Android flagship market despite the impending launch of the Galaxy S25 series.

  • The Galaxy S23 is currently available at a significant discount, making it a compelling option compared to newer models.
  • Features a 6.1-inch display, IP68 rating, and a triple camera setup, ensuring premium quality in a compact form.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 with 8 GB RAM and 128 GB storage, it excels in multitasking and gaming.
  • Runs on Android 14-based OneUI 6, with eligibility for two major OS upgrades.
  • Battery life is average; 3,900 mAh should suffice for typical daily use.
"The Galaxy S23 offers a solid software experience and is suitable for users seeking a durable smartphone for the next two to three years."

In conclusion, the Galaxy S23 stands as a viable and attractive option for anyone seeking a compact and capable smartphone without breaking the bank.

item.title: Instagram lets you revisit missed Stories with a new highlights feature - India TV News
item.description:
Instagram Lets You Revisit Missed Stories with a New Highlights Feature

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: India TV News

Instagram has introduced a new feature aimed at enhancing user engagement by allowing users to revisit unseen Story Highlights, ensuring they never miss updates from mutual followers.

  • The feature is currently being tested and will appear at the end of the Stories tray.
  • Users will see curated Story Highlights only after viewing current stories, promoting greater interaction.
  • Social media expert Ahmed Ghanem first spotted the feature, emphasizing its role in focusing back on personal connections.
  • Instagram is also rolling out a ‘live location sharing’ feature, allowing users to share their location for up to one hour in private chats.
“We’re always working on new ways to help people connect in Stories.” - Meta spokesperson

These updates signify Instagram's ongoing commitment to strengthening personal connections and improving overall user experience on the platform.

item.title: Full Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070 Ti and GeForce RTX 5070 specs revealed by reliable tipster - Notebookcheck.net
item.description:
Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070 Ti and RTX 5070 Specifications Unveiled

Date: 2024-12-25 Source: Notebookcheck

Nvidia's upcoming mid-range desktop GPUs, the GeForce RTX 5070 Ti and GeForce RTX 5070, have surfaced through a leak revealing key specifications.

  • The GeForce RTX 5070 Ti will feature 16 GB of GDDR7 VRAM, while the RTX 5070 will have 12 GB.
  • The RTX 5070 Ti is expected to perform comparably to the previous generation RTX 4080.
  • The RTX 5070 is positioned as a 1080p gaming card.
  • The new GPUs aim to address varying VRAM demands for gamers.
Prolific leaker Kopite7kimi reports that the RTX 5070 Ti will come with 8,960 CUDA cores and a total graphics power (TGP) of 300 Watts.

The specs suggest that Nvidia is catering to both budget-conscious gamers and those seeking more high-performance options.

item.title: Google Chrome Could Soon Reportedly Benefit from AI-Powered Gemini Live Capabilities - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Google May Soon Bring Its AI-Powered Gemini Live Feature to Chrome

Publication Date: November 21, 2024, Source: Gadgets 360

Google's Gemini Live feature, a real-time conversational AI, may be appearing on the desktop version of Chrome based on developer discoveries and social media claims.

  • Gemini Live was first available on Android in September 2024 and on iOS recently.
  • Rumors of its arrival on Chrome were shared by tipster Leopeva64, citing findings in Chromium Gerrit.
  • The feature may require microphone and location access and have a dedicated user interface.
  • Users can interact in real-time using natural language, with options for different voices and languages.
The new button in Chrome's tab strip now opens a floating panel, although it is not yet possible to interact with this panel; after digging deep into Chromium Gerrit and based on the codename, I am 99% sure that this feature is... Gemini Live for Chrome. — Leopeva64

This potential incorporation of Gemini Live suggests a shift toward more interactive and responsive web browsing experiences powered by AI.

item.title: Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes for gems, pets, and more - GUIDE - ET Now
item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX Redeem Codes Guide for Gems, Pets, and More

Updated: Dec 25, 2024 | Source: ET Now News

Garena Free Fire MAX provides players with redeem codes that grant exciting rewards like gems, pets, and skins, enhancing their gaming experience without the need for real money.

  • Garena Free Fire MAX offers thrilling rewards to gamers.
  • Rewards include gems, pets, skins, and clothing.
  • Redeem codes are available for a limited time, generally 12 to 18 hours.

New Redeem Codes

The following codes were added on December 25:

  • GXFT7YNWTQSZ
  • FFX4QKNFSM9Y
  • AYNFFQPXTW9K
  • VY2KFXT9FQNC
  • XF4SWKCH6KY4
  • NPTFYW7QPXN2
  • WFS2Y7NQFV9S
  • FXK2NDY5QSMX
  • FC4XSKWQFX9Y

How to Redeem Codes

  • Visit the Rewards Redemption page.
  • Enter your login details for platforms like Facebook, Apple ID, or Google.
  • Input the code in the designated box and confirm.

This method allows users to reap the rewards which enhance their gameplay in Garena Free Fire MAX.

item.title: Oppo Reno 13 Design Revealed in Official Teaser Video; India Launch Likely Soon - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Oppo Reno 13 5G Design Revealed in Official Teaser Video Ahead of Launch

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Gadgets 360

Oppo has teased the global launch of the Oppo Reno 13 and Reno 13 Pro smartphones, showcasing key design elements in a newly released teaser video.

  • The Oppo Reno 13 5G series will launch in select markets outside China.
  • The global variants will feature a similar design to their Chinese counterparts, with aluminum frames and sculpted glass back panels.
  • The phones will sport ultra-thin bezels and a Butterfly Shadow Design on the back panels.
  • They will come with IP69-rated protection against dust and water ingress.
  • Expected specifications include MediaTek Dimensity 8350 SoC, 50-megapixel camera setups, AMOLED displays, and 80W wired charging.
“The series will include a Plume Purple colourway.”

In conclusion, the Oppo Reno 13 5G series aims to combine cutting-edge design with powerful specifications, catering to users looking for style and performance.
